text.content:
Crumpling Blow

The target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Bludgeoning

Pierced

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn.

Piercing

Throat Slash

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target takes [[/r 1d8[bleed]]]. The target can't talk, cast spells with a verbal component, or breathe while subject to this bleed damage.

Slashing

Life Leech

If this is a spell, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 1} and you regain [[/r 1d8]] Hit Points.

Bomb or Spell
